entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'DAD'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 16.85

This simple and elegant individually boxed Father's Day will be a great gift itself to your Dad on Father's Day or his birthday. It can be personalised with your own special message on front and inside and makes a gorgeous keepsake.

The cover this design boasts the word 'DAD' with both 'D' letters printed in black colour and letter 'A' printed in red on round frame filled with water baubles and fashionably adorned with crystal clear and red real crystals.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'Bow Tie'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 19.50

An awesome Bow Tie card for any classy Dad. The main feature of the design is a handmade stylish bow tie scattered with colourful ribbon roses, pomp poms and with black giant rosette in the middle. The whole arrangement is stylishly adorned with topaz crystals and metallic rhinestuds. Presented in our signature luxury gift box - it will just perfect to complement any Father's Day present or be a gift by itself.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'Moustache'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 19.50

A classy moustache card for any trendy Dad. The design features a handmade moustache scattered with blue, black and white ribbon roses and pomp poms. The whole arrangement mounted to a premium quality grey textured card in the middle and stylishly adorned with blue and crystal clear crystals . The card come in our special luxury gift box and for sure will just a perfect for Father's Day, birthday or just because.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'Love To Travel'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 17.50

This nautical themed card will be a great gift for your dad on Father's Day and will make a lovely keepsake. Perfect for any father who loves sea, owns a boat or likes to travel in general.

The front of design features the printed word 'dad' filled with a map pattern and decorated with crystals. Underneath the word 'dad' the card is handcrafted with lovely satin & twine bow and blue and white handmade paper compass which is also embellished with genuine crystals.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Photo Father's Day Card 'Our Super Dad'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 17.50

Wish your Dad a Very Happy Father's Day full of fun and surprises with this bright and colourful photo card. It will be personalised with your favourite photograph mounted to the black and red paper frame in the middle of t the design and embellished with gems, die cut paper balloons and red satin ribbon bows.

This photo Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'Bottle'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 18.55

This Father's Day card is truly luxurious and personal, and can be customised with your own words both on front inside. The box and presentation make this look like a gift in itself. The main feature of the design is a print of brown flowers in shape of a bottle mounted to the gold and white paper frame in the middle of the card. The whole arrangement is stunningly adorned with gold, cream and black satin ribbons roses, crystals, chocolate satin ribbon and bow.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

This striking and bold luxury boxed Father's Day will be an awesome present itself to your Dad on Father's Day. It can be personalised with your own special message on front and inside and makes a truly special keepsake.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'Father's Day Balloons'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 17.50

Cheerful, bright and colourful - this cad for certain will make any dad smile this Dad's Day. The design boasts the word 'DAD' printed in blue colours with die cut paper balloons floating above it. The whole arrangement is stunningly adorned with crystals, red satin bows and red round buttons.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card 'Anchor'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 17.95

A great card with an inspiring cover message to tell your Dad a 'huge thank you' for all that help and support and for being your 'anchor' throughout the years.

This luxury father's day design features the print of blue anchor placed on silver and black panels onto the line filled with printed ship wheel and anchor pattern and elegantly hand-decorated with real crystals, black metallic hearts and blue & white twine.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.

entry.title: Luxury Boxed Father's Day Card'Tie'
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lotus Art Studio
Type: Father's Day Cards
Price: 18.55

A special card for a special Dad on Father's day. The design features a print of brown flowers in shape of a tie mounted to the gold and purple paper frame in the middle of the card. The whole arrangement is beautifully decorated with gold, cream and black satin ribbons roses, crystals and rhinestuds.

This Father's Day card is beautifully presented in luxury gift box with a black velveteen frame inside for maximum presentation.
